GR13sratrpau:0: PADA MARKERS For a four-pada verse:
GR13sratrpau:2: namaḥ śivāya śaktyai ca $ bindave śāśvatāya ca &

GR13sratrpau:15: yogāśca vividhāḥ karma % nityanaimittikaṃ tathā // SRtp_7 //
GR13sratrpau:21: na tābhyāṃ sadṛśaḥ kaścic % chreya āptividhāyakaḥ // SRtp_10 //
GR13sratrpau:23: āptastu śiva evaikaḥ % śivānye tvaśivā matāḥ // SRtp_11 //
GR13sratrpau:27: hetubhiḥ sādhyate kintu % dhanyairāghrāyate sadā // SRtp_13 //
GR13sratrpau:31: avagāhya parānanda- % laharī yadi notkṣipet // SRtp_15 //
GR13sratrpau:32: tadatra kathitaṃ sarva- $ srotasāṃ jyāyasi prabhoḥ &
GR13sratrpau:35: na hyatra śemuṣī śuddhā % vipulāpi pragalbhate // SRtp_17 //
GR13sratrpau:37: trīṇi ratnāni ko vetti % siddhāntena vinā svayam // SRtp_18 //
GR13sratrpau:39: tadvadyogaṃ ca ko vetti % sabījābījalakṣaṇam // SRtp_19 //
GR13sratrpau:40: siddhāntaḥ sevitaḥ sadbhir $ api kāmān prayacchati &

GR13sratrpau:44: jāyate 'dhvā yataḥ śuddho $ vartate yatra līyate &
GR13sratrpau:49: tatra vidyābhujaḥ pūrve % mantrā vidyāśca nāmataḥ // SRtp_24 //
GR13sratrpau:51: teṣāṃ purāṇi viyāyāṃ % vāmādīni yathottaram // SRtp_25 //

GR13sratrpau:69: yadyadutpadyate vastu % tanmāyeyaṃ yathā kalā // SRtp_34 //

GR13sratrpau:90: saiṣā vikalpavijñāna- $ gocaraiva satī ca yat &

GR13sratrpau:96: māyāyāḥ sā ca vidvadbhir $ baindavaṃ tattvamucyate &
GR13sratrpau:97: ato na māyopādānaṃ % tathaivāyaṃ maheśvaraḥ // SRtp_48 //

GR13sratrpau:105: tathaiva ca citiḥ śaktis % tayorapyavikāriṇoḥ // SRtp_52 //
GR13sratrpau:112: tadeva yadi tatkuryāt $ kiṃ tairiti vilupyatām &
GR13sratrpau:121: na buddheḥ pariṇāmo vā % māyordhvamapi sambhavāt // SRtp_60 //
GR13sratrpau:124: aṇutvea sati kartṛtvād $ asmatpreṣyo yathā janaḥ &
GR13sratrpau:127: pariṇāmasya kartāyaṃ % na tu vṛttestatastathā // SRtp_63 //
GR13sratrpau:128: idamevaṃ mayā kṣubdham $ iṣṭaṃ sampādayed dhruvam &
GR13sratrpau:129: iti jānāti yaḥ śaktaḥ % sa kartā pariṇāminām // SRtp_64 //
GR13sratrpau:131: tathā hi sarvo nirdhūta- % vikalpamavalokayan // SRtp_65 //
GR13sratrpau:134: sarvaṃ cediha vijñātam $ iṣyetaiṣa karoti ca &
GR13sratrpau:136: vṛttireva matā bindoḥ $ paṭasyeva kuṭī tataḥ &
GR13sratrpau:138: naivaṃ vidyeśvaro māyām $ eṣā hi pariṇāminī &
GR13sratrpau:140: kurvato 'pi kuṭīṃ buddhiḥ $ savikalpā hi dṛśyate &
GR13sratrpau:141: śabdatattvamaghoṣā vāg % brahma kuṇḍalinī dhruvam // SRtp_70 //
GR13sratrpau:146: tatra sā vaikharī śrotra- $ grāhyā yārthasya vācikā &
GR13sratrpau:159: kevalaḥ paramānando % ghoro nityoditaḥ prabhuḥ // SRtp_78 //
GR13sratrpau:160: nāstameti na codeti $ na śrānto na vikāravān &
GR13sratrpau:164: tāmeva vāṇīṃ sūkṣmākhyām % āhurātmavido janāḥ // SRtp_80 //
GR13sratrpau:166: ābhyo viviktamātmānaṃ % na hi paśyanti pudgalāḥ // SRtp_81 //

GR13sratrpau:229: sā tu sphuradanekārcis % trikoṇā svastikāṅkitā // SRtp_107 //

GR13sratrpau:245: atra ca trīṇi tattvāni % pañcamī tu parā kalā // SRtp_114 //
GR13sratrpau:247: śivatattvātmakaṃ tatra $ purāṇi daśa pañca ca &

GR13sratrpau:258: sarvamākramya ca tayā $ vijānāti karoti ca &

GR13sratrpau:685: A plain affirmation, in spite of what Agh's commentary may say, of the karmasāmyapakṣa (not the malaparipākapakṣa).
